notes: This map illustrates satellite-detected waters in Savu area, Naitasiri Province situated in the south of Viti Levu Island (Fiji). Using satellite imagery collected by RADARSAT-2 on 21 February 2016 and 08 April 2015, UNOSAT identified ~ 1,100 hectares of land to be potentially affected by waters. Most of the affected areas are agricultural fields located along the banks of River Rewa.
